body_html: @carlthome - it seems like your might be seeing this error if you're trying to update metrics in cross tower mode. Typically, we would expect metrics to be computed in tower mode, as that's where your labels and logits etc are available. Could you provide a complete stack trace + your code that triggers this so we can debug further?
